title: #336: Alchemy, Radionics, Sacred Geometry, Magic and Astrology with Phoenix Aurelius
description:
Thank you so much for listening to another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Alchemist Phoenix Aurelius to the show to discuss his use of using Radionics, Alchemy and Astrology to deal with disease. Plus cranks up his radionic instrument and answers all of our questions about the universe in one the best Tin Foil Hat episodes we have ever done. Thank you so much for your support!

Please check out Phoenix Aurelius's website and internet:
Website: www.phoenixaurelius.org

Free Teachable Classes and Other Courses:
Phoenix-Aurelius-Research-Academy.PhoenixAurelius.com
